name: Scenario 1
title: Repeat complaint - Update impact - High CLV - Make offer

scenario_details.operational_insight: The Software_Updates database indicates a major update was rolled out yesterday for the AutoMow 3000. The issue may be linked to the update, suggesting a possible fault introduced on the company’s end.
scenario_details.customer_insights_and_retention_strategy: The customer is marked as High CLV. The Discount database indicates a 20% discount for 6 months is available for high CLV customers using this product. It is recommended to offer this discount as a goodwill gesture.
recommended_system_response: Acknowledge the repeat issue and apologize for the inconvenience.
Confirm that a recent major update might have impacted the product’s functionality.
Reassure the customer that the issue is being prioritized.
Offer: 'As a valued customer, we’re offering you a 20% discount for the next 6 months on your lawnmower subscription.'
